title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 29 - Electronic Recording And Audio-visual Coverage In Court Facilities And Of Court Proceedings
content:

§ 29.3 - Trial courts
§ 29.4 - Videotape cameras and recorders

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 29

Statutory authority: Constitution, art. VI, § 28[c]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
